title: Enjoy file sharing that’s quick and secure with Smmall Cloud, now under $80
content:
Macworld

There are a lot of file-sharing sites out there, but the experience of using them can feel pretty impersonal, even when they’re your own files you’re sharing. Smmall Cloud has distinguished itself in a crowded field by combining a laser focus on quick, unlimited uploads with a customizable approach that can help creatives and other entrepreneurs to market themselves more effectively.

With Smmall Cloud’s individual plan, you can make unlimited individual uploads every month, though files can’t exceed the 5GB size limit. The clutter-free interface makes all these uploads easy and quick, but the real appeal is the ability to customize how they get received. Users can add their own branding to every file, allowing them to quickly build a following while sharing screenshots, video, or audio. 

Smmall Cloud also has extra perks, like complete Markdown support, support for sharing Retina graphics, easy PDF sharing and previewing, and more.

Enjoy a more user-friendly file-sharing experience when you get a lifetime subscription to the Smmall Cloud Individual Plan for just $79.99.
